content.Color: Int Color of the displayed particle.
content.Duration: Int Maximum age of the field. Field dissipated at this age, regardless of radius.
content.ReapplicationDelay: Int Number of ticks before reapplying the effect.
content.WaitTime: Int Time before deploying the field. Doesn't apply the effect until age is >= this.
content.DurationOnUse: Float Unknown. Does not effect age or duration.
content.RadiusOnUse: Float Amount the radius grown upon applying the effect. Usually negative.
content.RadiusPerTick: Float Amount the radius grows per tick. Usually negative.
content.Particle: String The particle displayed by the area effect.
content.ParticleParam1: Int For blockdust, blockcrack and fallingdust particles, specifies a numeric block id and a data value, using a single number: id+(data*4096). For iconcrack, specifies a block or item id.
content.ParticleParam2: Int For iconcrack, specifies a data value.
content.Potion: The name of the default potion effect.

Effects.desc: A list of the applied effects.
